Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Will's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Will joined a community called the Alexandria Safe Zone where, upon being interviewed by Deanna , he was appointed as a supply runner in a team alongside Aiden , Nicholas , and three other residents where they searched for supplies around the town. During a supply run in an abandoned town, the scouting party was attacked by walkers while Will was left behind by Aiden and Nicholas out of cowardice. Over time, a partially devoured Will reanimated and, due to being pinned and immobilized under a car, gradually deteriorated. When Glenn and Nicholas head out into the abandoned town to set fire to a feed store to lure walkers away, the two come across the zombified Will still pinned under a car. Feeling guilty and responsible for having caused his death, Nicholas stabs him in the head to put him down.
Death[]: Killed By Aiden Monroe (Caused, Alive) Zombies (Alive) Nicholas (Caused, Alive; Zombified) While Will, Aiden, and Nicholas were on a supply run, they ran into trouble with some walkers. As a result, Aiden and Nicholas chose to leave Will behind, resulting in his death. Sometime later, he is found reanimated and is stabbed in the head out of mercy by Nicholas.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Will has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
